detectors.description:
PctPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#684-699) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#690)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#693)

[PctPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#L684-L699) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#L690)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#L693)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in PctPool.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#670-673):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#671)
		- stakeToken.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#596)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#523)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#523)
		- pct.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#679)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#623)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#622)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#678)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#625)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#672)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PctPool.sol#626)
